app.name: Weather App
app.tagline: Accurate weather forecasts updated in real-time

home.title: Weather App | Accurate Weather Forecasts
home.description: Look up weather in any city worldwide. Hourly and 5-day weather forecasts with data from OpenWeatherMap.

hero.heading: Accurate weather forecasts
hero.subheading: Look up weather in any city worldwide

search.placeholder: Enter city name (e.g., Hanoi, Tokyo, London...)

hourly.title: Hourly Forecast
hourly.description: Detailed weather updates hourly for the next 48 hours

daily.title: 5-Day Forecast
daily.description: Plan ahead with accurate long-term weather forecasts

global.title: Global Coverage
global.description: Look up weather in any city around the world

result.title: Weather in %s, %s | Hourly Forecast
result.description: Weather in %s: %s°C, %s. View detailed hourly and 5-day forecasts.

about.title: About | Weather App
about.description: Weather App - Free weather lookup application with data from OpenWeatherMap API.
about.heading: About Weather App

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.content1: Weather App is a free weather lookup application that provides accurate, real-time weather forecasts for any city in the world.
aboutUs.content2: The application is developed with the goal of providing the best user experience, with a simple, friendly interface that's easy to use on any device.

dataSource.title: Data Source
dataSource.content: All weather data is provided by OpenWeatherMap - one of the world's most trusted weather data services with over 200,000 cities and high accuracy.

list.current: Current weather with detailed info (temperature, humidity, wind, pressure...)
list.responsive: Responsive interface, compatible with all devices

developer.title: Developer
developer.description: A development team passionate about technology and wanting to bring useful products to the community.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Weather App does not collect or store any personal information. Search queries are processed immediately and are not saved.

404.heading: Page Not Found
404.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

500.heading: An Error Occurred
500.message: An error occurred. Please try again later.

suggestions.title: You can try:
suggestions.searchOther: Search for another city on the homepage
suggestions.refresh: Refresh the page and try again

errors.notFound: City "%s" not found. Please check the city name.
errors.invalidApiKey: Invalid API key. Please contact administrator.
errors.rateLimit: Request limit exceeded. Please try again in a few minutes.
errors.generic: Unable to fetch weather data. Please try again later.
